aboutRight.aboutText: Born in 2000, AB type living in USA. We provide on-screen design for websites and apps, as well as front-end implementation. We will continue to pursue a wide range of expressions and better code by pursuing our “likes”.

archivement.text: Hello there! My name is Lilon Macwan. I am a web designer & developer, and Im very passionate and dedicated to my work.
With 10+ years experience as a professional designer, I have acquired the skills to make your project a success.

aboutRight.note: “Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Faucibus sed sit ultrices et sed metus sollicitudin.”

experienceData.text: As a junior developer, I’ve had the chance to work on real-world projects through internships and freelance work, where I contributed to both front-end and back-end development. From building responsive websites in WordPress and Elementor to creating dynamic dashboards using Laravel, Vue.js, and the MERN stack, each experience helped me grow technically and professionally.

serviceData.title: Full-Stack Developer
serviceData.text: I build end-to-end web applications, integrating powerful back-end logic with intuitive front-end interfaces. Whether it's a dynamic dashboard or an enterprise solution, I ensure smooth performance and scalability.
serviceData.techStackText: React, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS

serviceData.title: MERN Stack Developer
serviceData.text: As a MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) developer, I specialize in building modern, full-stack JavaScript applications. From developing RESTful APIs to designing seamless user interfaces, I create efficient and scalable solutions.
serviceData.techStackText: React, Next.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS

serviceData.title: WordPress Developer
serviceData.heading: Neque quo numquam consequuntur odio porro quidem soluta amet eveniet. Similique eum cupiditate repellat ipsa.
serviceData.text: I develop custom WordPress websites that are fast, responsive, and visually appealing. Whether it’s an e-commerce store or a business website, I customize themes, plugins, and Elementor layouts for a unique user experience.
serviceData.techStackText: WordPress, Elementor, PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS

serviceData.title: SEO Optimization
serviceData.heading: Sint, mollitia accusamus odit inventore, veritatis eos repellendus nihil voluptates voluptatibus adipisci
serviceData.text: I enhance website performance and search engine rankings through effective SEO strategies. By optimizing content, improving technical SEO, and leveraging analytics, I help websites attract more traffic and achieve better visibility.
serviceData.techStackText: SEMrush, Yoast SEO, Google Search Console, Google Analytics

contactInfo.title: Chat to us
contactInfo.text: Our friendly team is there to help.

contactInfo.title: Visit us
contactInfo.text: Come say hello at ur office HQ. Warnwe Park Streetperrine, FL 33157 New York City

contactForm.title: Got Ideas? We have got the skills. Lets team up.
contactForm.text: Tell us more about yourself and what you are got in mind.

projectData.title: Dartix – Site Vitrine
projectData.description: A professional showcase website developed for Dartix to present their digital training services and solutions. The platform highlights the company’s offerings with a clean, responsive design and smooth user experience.
projectData.tech: Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, Zustand, Bootstrap, Material UI

projectData.title: Dartix – Dashboard
projectData.description: A dynamic and intuitive dashboard designed for managing users, courses, meetings, and gamified challenges within the Dartix platform. The interface allows administrators to oversee students, teachers, and rewards in a visually organized and responsive environment.
projectData.tech: Laravel, Vue.js, TypeScript, Pinia, Bootstrap, Node.js
